name: bomoge-claude-code-plugins
description: Community plugins for Claude Code - SEO analysis, development tools, and more

plugins.name: seo-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive SEO analysis and optimization plugin. Analyzes codebases for SEO issues, provides actionable improvements with severity levels, and helps implement fixes.

plugins.name: prod-ready
plugins.description: Comprehensive production readiness checker. Analyzes applications for security, code quality, UI/UX, functionality, performance, SEO, infrastructure, responsiveness, and accessibility before public release.

plugins.name: mobile-ux
plugins.description: Mobile UX analysis and optimization plugin. Transforms web apps into native-like mobile experiences with touch interactions, thumb zones, PWA capabilities, and app-like feel.
